name: Imperium Universalis
summary: Imperium Universalis is a total conversion mod for Europa Universalis IV. The mod spans from the Age of Empires, starting from the 10th of August 142 AUC (612 BCE), through the Archaic Period, the Classical Period, the Early Hellenistic Period, the Late Hellenistic Period, the Imperial Period to end in Early Migration Period 1127 AUC (374 CE).
